channel.title: Need help with adding npc
channel.description: i added one npc after i read a tut... it got put in my game perfectly =], now im trying 2 add a imp... i got the id of it but wen i add it into autospawn.cfg. then i compiled it then hit run... wen the box that comes up for run it say's. "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: for input string: "1507 3250" this is what i put in the autospawn.cfg, here it is: spawn = 1507 3250 3421 0 3250 3421 3253 3422 1 can someone help me?

item.title: Need help with adding npc
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

i added one npc after i read a tut… it got put in my game perfectly =], now im trying 2 add a imp… i got the id of it but wen i add it into autospawn.cfg. then i compiled it then hit run… wen the box that comes up for run it say’s.
"Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: for input string: “1507 3250”
this is what i put in the autospawn.cfg,
here it is: spawn = 1507 3250 3421 0 3250 3421 3253 3422 1
can someone help me?

Read full topic
